Use your email access to set up your pro: Use your email access to set up your profile and start analyzing
onboarding_subheader1: Sonalysis is programmed to collect data from every match, including live games, and break it down for each user to understand.
onboarding_subheader2: Sonalysis makes it simple for users to gather player information and make comparisons.
onboarding_subheader3: Sonalysis allows club administrators and coaches to easily view player analysis, track team performance, and manage their teams.
